QuestData.Title: WANTED: The Dark Iron Spy
QuestData.Description: A dark iron spy has infiltrated the town, stolen documents from the Explorers' League establishment, and is now in hiding somewhere nearby. He was last sighted near the top of the hill to the south of town.$B$BA sizable reward awaits anyone who can bring this spy to justice. Dead or alive - dead preferred.
QuestData.RewardText: You brought that damned spy to justice! This is good news. We can all rest a little bit easier, not worrying about that one.
